General.Name: CHUNGDAHM Learning Inc
General.Description: Creverse, Inc. engages in the education business in South Korea and internationally. It provides kindergarten and adult learning content services, as well as operates learning assessment centers. The company was formerly known as CHUNGDAHM Learning, Inc. and changed its name to Creverse, Inc. in March 2022. Creverse, Inc. was founded in 1998 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
